name: Your Name
title: Software Developer & Researcher
tagline: Building elegant solutions to complex problems
bio: I'm a passionate developer focused on creating meaningful digital experiences. With a background in computer science and a love for clean code, I enjoy tackling challenging problems and turning ideas into reality. When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, reading research papers, or contributing to open-source projects.
